first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 3
first_interaction.text: Hmm... ang hirap naman ng trabaho namin dito sa istasyon.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 3
first_interaction.text: Laging may mga kaso na kailangan namin i-monitor. Nakakastress talaga.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 3
first_interaction.text: Pero ganun talaga ang buhay ng isang station guard. Kailangan namin maging alerto.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 3
first_interaction.text: Sana makahanap ako ng mas magandang trabaho sa susunod na taon.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 3
repeated_interaction.text: Ang hirap pa rin ng trabaho namin dito.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 3
repeated_interaction.text: Sana makahanap ako ng mas magandang trabaho.
